projects.title: RadioWired
projects.description: RadioWired is a podcast sampler & discovery application. RadioWired will recommend new podcasts based on user preferences. Users can make playlists, favorite new gems, and listen to the latest episodes. Built with React & Redux, a Rails API backend and syled with Semantic UI. Powered by the ListenNotes API.

projects.title: The Driving Dead
projects.description: Inspired by Crazy Taxi and Pac Man, The Driving Dead is a browser game in which the user, driving a taxi, has to rush to collect(run over) as many passengers (zombies) as possible. This is a single page application, entirely written with HTML, CSS, & Javascript. Users and scores are saved to a Rails backend  which provides the API to manage user data and scores.

projects.description:
a virtual garden for you.
